name: The Front of Brokenhearted Alliance
description:
The Front of Brokenhearted Alliance，is a 2D text adventure puzzle game. 

In this game，player play as a  fuckboy （womanizer）.The player needs to interact with the three girls through his mobile phone, and then through some clues, he discovers that the three girls have known each other and know they were fooled by this fuckboy.He begins to feel repentant, but it's too late, then three girls appear and kill him.

How to play： to click different object on scene

Theme： 1，Girls better fight/work together is the best way to punish fuck boy
